title: Alessandra Ambrosio showcases her sensational physique while on her way to Pilates class
text:
She's one of the world's top supermodels with a career spanning more than 20 years.

And Alessandra Ambrosio looked nothing short of sensational as she went to Pilates class in Santa Monica recently.

The Brazilian beauty, 38, cut a casual figure for the day, donning a lavender grey vest top that displayed her taut abdomen along with matching leggings.

Stunning: Alessandra Ambrosio, 38, looked nothing short of sensational as she went to Pilates class in Santa Monica recently

Alessandra tied a hoodie around her waist while she also wore a pair of flip flops and large sunglasses.

Styling her brunette locks into a relaxed updo, the former Victoria's Secret Angel completed her look with a golden heart-shaped necklace.

Alessandra began taking modelling classes at the tender age of 12 and began her working at 15 when she modelled for Dilson Stein.

Her career began in earnest when she competed in Brazil's national Elite Model Look competition and later appeared on the cover of Brazilian Elle magazine.

Stylish: The Brazilian beauty cut a casual figure for the day, donning a dark grey vest top that displayed her taut abdomen along with matching leggings

It comes after Alessandra collaborated with her sister Aline Ambrosio and pal Gisele Coria to launch a new swimwear line, which debuted in March.

The brand takes its title from a nickname for Florianopolis, the Brazilian city where Alessandra gave birth to both of her children.

Ale, as her fans affectionately call her, is currently in a relationship with Italian hunk Nicolo Oddi, who founded the fashion brand Alanui with his sister Carlotta.

Last year, Alessandra broke her decade-long engagement to RE/DONE founder Jaime Mazur, with whom she shares two children - Anja, 11, and Noah, seven.

Business: Alessandra collaborated with her sister Aline Ambrosio and pal Gisele Coria to launch a new swimwear line, which debuted in March

Neither Jamie nor Alessandra, who got engaged in 2008, publicly confirmed the breakup reports when they surfaced last March.

A source told Us Weekly that the pair were 'trying to keep their split on the down low, but Alessandra has been out and about ready to mingle and hasn’t been taking Jamie to anything.'

Alessandra, who walked a Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in Miami Beach roughly three months after delivering Anja, left the brand at the end of 2017.

She announced her departure after walking the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in Shanghai - her 17th overall outing at the annual extravaganza.
description: The Brazilian beauty, 38, looked nothing short of radiant as she went to Pilates class in Santa Monica recently.
